description:
Many people have great ideas and know how to make great products. However, these people are often unsure what to do about those products legally and business-wise.

Do they need a patent? Is their product an invention? Did someone else come up with the invention before them? How do they protect their idea or start a business if they don't have the money?

If you are an engineer, inventor, or an entrepreneur attempting to navigate the patent field, then this course is for you.

The purpose of this course isÂ to give you a good understanding of how to do a preliminary patent search, so that you can make business and patent decisions on a more informed basis.
title: DIY Patent Searching
